job description:
This stable marketing company is looking for a Lead Big Data Engineer to help drive their team in building out a new product. You must have very strong Spark experience and be familiar with AWS, Big Data, and either Java or Scala programming. Youd be allowed a lot of opportunity to take ownership and drive an entire team.
  • Strong Spark experience
  • Experience with AWS
  • Java or Scala programming
  • Various Big Data Tools
  • EMR within AWS
  • Hadoop/Hive/HDFS
  • Experience working on multiple platforms
  • 5+ years of experience
    • Tech Breakdown
  • 90% Development
  • 10% Architecture
    • Daily Responsibilities
  • 60% Hands On
  • 20% Management Duties
  • 20% Team Collaboration
  • Competitive Salary: Up to $150K/year, DOE
    • You will receive the following benefits:
  • Medical Insurance & Health Savings Account (HSA)
  • 401(k)
  • Paid Sick Time Leave
  • Pre-tax Commuter Benefit
  • Generous Bonus Structure
  • Flex Time
  • Simple Transit Options
